assessment:

subject: $DefeatedFaction driven from Sector
summary: $TheDefeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Sector are clearly over.
assessment: $TheDefeatedFaction are no longer a relevant player in the Sector.

subject: $DefeatedFaction driven from Sector
summary: $TheDefeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Sector are clearly over.
assessment: With your faction beaten and scattered, you are on your own with whatever allies you still have or can cobble up, until such time as you can reassert $theDefeatedFaction's presence in the Sector.

subject: $DefeatedFaction driven from Sector
summary: $TheDefeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Sector are clearly over.
assessment: With the defeat of $theDefeatedFaction, your $victorFaction reigns supreme over the Sector. Congratulations!

subject: $Faction arrive in $clusterName
summary: $TheFaction are moving into the $clusterName cluster, with a foothold in $market.

subject: $Faction return to $clusterName
summary: $TheFaction have regained a foothold in the $clusterName cluster, at $market.

subject: Monthly salary report: $paid received
summary: You have received $paid from $theEmployer for your continued services.

subject: Monthly salary report: no payment
summary: Due to your bad conduct in their eyes, $theEmployer have witheld your salary for this month.

subject: Insurance payout: $paid received
summary: You have received $paid from $theEmployer to help cover your losses in the recent battle.

subject: Insurance payout: no payment
summary: Due to your bad conduct in their eyes, $theEmployer have refused to make any insurance payments.

subject: $Faction invasion fleet headed for $target
summary: A $faction invasion fleet is assembling at $market to invade $target in $targetLocation, held by $theTargetFaction. It will be underway within a few days.
assessment: Invasion strength rating: ~$dp

subject: $Faction invasion fleet headed for $target
summary: A $faction invasion fleet is assembling at $market to invade $target in $targetLocation, held by $theTargetFaction. It will be underway within a few days.

subject: $Faction invasion fleet sent to $target repulsed
summary: The $faction invasion fleet sent to $target ($targetFaction) in $targetLocation has been intercepted and driven back with heavy losses. Surviving elements are retreating to $market.

subject: $Faction invasion fleet sent to $target repulsed
summary: The $faction invasion fleet sent to $target ($targetFaction) in $targetLocation has been intercepted and driven back with heavy losses. Surviving elements are retreating to $market.

subject: $Faction invasion of $target fails
summary: $Faction ground forces attempting to invade $target ($targetFaction) in $targetLocation have been defeated. The invasion fleet is withdrawing to $market.

subject: $Faction invasion of $target fails
summary: $Faction ground forces attempting to invade $target ($targetFaction) in $targetLocation have been defeated. The invasion fleet is withdrawing to $market.

subject: $Faction invasion of $target recalled: no longer hostile
summary: As $target in $targetLocation is no longer controlled by a hostile faction ($targetFaction), the $faction invasion fleet has been recalled.

subject: $Faction invasion of $target recalled: no longer hostile
summary: As $target in $targetLocation is no longer controlled by a hostile faction ($targetFaction), the $faction invasion fleet has been recalled.

subject: Slave trade on $market
summary: Rumors have surfaced concerning your sale of slaves on $market. The lawful factions in the $location are appalled at your lack of respect for basic human dignity.
assessment: Reputation reduced by $repPenaltyAbs.

subject: Joined $newFaction
summary: You have joined $theNewFaction. Your new employers are expecting great deeds of you.

subject: Left $oldFaction
summary: You have left $theOldFaction to stake it out on your own.

subject: Joined $newFaction
summary: You have left $theOldFaction for $theNewFaction. Your new employers are expecting great deeds of you.

subject: Expelled from $oldFaction
summary: Due to your abominable conduct, $theOldFaction have expelled you from their ranks.

subject: New alliance: $alliance
summary: $TheFaction1 and $theFaction2 have established a formal alliance, known as the $alliance. Their enemies should beware.

subject: $Faction1 leaves $alliance
summary: Due to their disagreements with one or more of the other factions, $theFaction1 have left the $alliance.
assessment: The alliance now has $numMembers members, holding $numMarkets markets with a total size of $marketSizeSum.

subject: $alliance dissolves
summary: The members of the $alliance have broken up and gone their separate ways.

summary: $TheVictorFaction and their allies are the only remaining powers in the $clusterName cluster. Peace has come to this corner of the Sector, at least for now.

subject: $VictorFaction $isOrAre victorious

subject: $Faction-$otherFaction talks break down

subject: $OtherFaction groom jilts $faction bride
summary: $market tabloids are abuzz with the news of a prominent $otherFaction figure who abandoned his $faction bride at the altar. The woman's influential family - and large segments of the public - are outraged.

subject: $OtherFaction political manipulation against $faction exposed

subject: Wave of anti-$otherFaction sentiment in $faction
summary: A sharp increase in hostility to $theOtherFaction on $market has been observed. $otherFaction citizens are being harassed and even assaulted on the streets, with authorities slow to respond.

subject: $Faction harbors $otherFaction criminal
